head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SAMAY, FLORENCE E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SAMAY, FLORENCE E.

block.p: SAMAY--Florence E., 77, of Pelham Manor. Wife of the late Walter. Mother of Linda (Robert Rosenthal) Samay, Richard (Roberta) Samay, grandmother of Rebecca Rosenthal, Matthew, Laurie, and Susan Samay, cousin of Barbara Samay. Funeral Service Thursday 10 am Edwards - Dowdle Funeral Home, 64 Ashford Avenue, Dobbs Ferry (exit 17 Saw Mill). Visiting today (Wednesday) 2-4 and 7-9 pm. Memorials to American Cancer Society appreciated.
